Row.Text: Defeating an enemy Unit provides [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness equal to 50% of its Combat Strength.

[LIST][LI]Defeating an enemy Unit provides [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] [B]Happiness [/B]equal to [B]50% [/B]of its [B]Combat Strength[/B].[LI][B]+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production [/B]towards constructing the [B]Mausoleum of Theodoric[/B].[/LIST]
+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production from being Germania's associated Wonder.
Capturing a City in Distant Land grants a burst of [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture.

[LIST][LI]Capturing a City in Distant Land grants a burst of [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture.[LI][B]+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production [/B]towards constructing the [B]Mausoleum of Theodoric[/B].[/LIST]
+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production from being Anglo-Saxons's associated Wonder.
Holy Roman Empire Exploration Age Civilization
Gain access to the Unique ‘Hoftag’ Project for City-States you’re Suzerain of, which allows you to choose an additional Suzerain bonus once.

[LIST][LI]Gain access to the Unique ‘Hoftag’ Project for City-States you’re Suzerain of, which allows you to choose an additional Suzerain bonus once.<[LI][B]+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production [/B]towards constructing the [B]Mausoleum of Theodoric[/B].[/LIST]
+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production from being the Holy Roman Empire's associated Wonder.
